alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benton and northeastern Washington Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1257 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of Highfill, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Decatur... Highfill... Garfield... Springtown... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Hobbs State Park... War Eagle... Centerton... Elm Springs... Avoca... Gateway... Larue... Rocky Comfort... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 73 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
